website_summaries.verdict: Comprehensive medical suture kit that ships with items needed to maximize practice time.
pros: Unit ships with an e-book, so you can learn more about suturing techniques while you're practicing
All tools and components ship inside a sturdy storage case with a zipper
Includes multiple tools, so you can practice any technique
cons: Suture pad may rip when practicing deep stitches

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! I’ve been using it for the past 2 weeks almost daily. It has all of the essentials for a student to learn suturing. The material is durable, not flimsy, and indicates that it is made from great quality. It is not bulky which makes it easy to carry around. The equipment comes in a protective zipped case. They provide disposable blades for the scalpel too, which was an added bonus! Definitely would buy again in the future. The company responds to questions and concerns very quickly and helped me with an issue immediately. I’d give this 10 stars if I could :)
customer_reviews.author: MERI

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Pretty impressed with the quality of the product. I have yet to play with my kit (due to school), but I will say I heard good things from a classmate of mine and I look forward to suturing and getting my hands on practice with this kit. I will also say the customer service has been great too!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Very good product & even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my gf who is in PA school. She really likes the suture kit and thinks it is very useful and a quality product! On my account i will have to say the customer service behind the scenes is amazing. I received a personla Instagram message checking to see how the product is and our feedback on it. I just thought that was really nest to see a personalized message. Customer service like that is hard to come by these days. Definitely would recommend this product anx this company.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Suture Kit with Great Supplies Included
customer_reviews.text: This kit is phenomenal! I’ve had other suturing kits in the past and I really like the supplies that came along with this one. I was extremely pleased with the size of the suture pad and the different styles of needle drivers that came along with the diverse threads provided. For the price and quality, you can’t beat this! I definitely recommend for anyone that is learning how to suture or even just wants some extra practice at home off the job.
customer_reviews.author: SHU95

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this product! Extremely easy to use. Quality is a lot better than others that I've used in the past. I ordered two and it was delivered faster than I expected and was extremely excited to test it out. This product will not fail you. They respond pretty fast too. One of the best services I've had with a company. Will definitely reorder when I run out of space.
customer_reviews.author: Christina N

customer_reviews.title: Best suture kit on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I love the kit so far! I am a Sophomore undergrad student on a pre-med track, and it has been great for learning some basics to impress the surgeons I shadow. I brought it with me to see one surgeon, and he showed me everything first hand and wished he had the kit when he was going through med school. Overall great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tom Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great company, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this suture practice kit top quality, the company has some of the greatest customer service I have ever experienced. The kit has all the resources you need to learn and practice suturing techniques! The company even offered free threads after ordering the product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Learning is fun
customer_reviews.text: Quick responses from the sender, and my order arrived fast. The practice pad is made of really good quality material and all the supplies are professional grade. I will be getting a lot of practice in on this, my classmates love it too. I am so glad learning items are easy to aquire and affordable. Thank you MedicalCreations!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Well made suture kit
customer_reviews.text: Every pieces that comes with this kit is well made and I can tell by the quality. Haven’t tried it but will do once I’m done with school. I’m counting on the suture pad as I will need it to be durable for reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Crish

customer_reviews.title: Great material and real tools
customer_reviews.text: I have attempted to use many other suture kits in the past and each had major pros and major cons. This product isn't perfect, but comparatively it is the best on the market in my opinion. The online Ebook, suture tools, suture device and the kit is very well made. It is presented well and very fun to use while learning a crucial skill. I would recommend ordering some extra sutures and try out different styles/length if needles etc. Great customer relations with their Instagram and very responsive if you run into problems with your product. Please don't hesitate on this product if you're looking for a starting point on your suture skills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Practical, good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The kit is very practical, easy to use and portable. It also comes with a guide on a few sutures that helps out new users. The skin is very close to the actual texture of human skin, I am already loving the kit. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, great company
customer_reviews.text: Really a great product, comes with tons of sutures and fake wounds of varying difficulty. Was great to teach myself with. I had a bit of an issue with the ebook as I was hoping for some videos to help assist me learn. I reached out to the company and they were very responsive, linking me videos that would help me, and saying they’d include hyperlinks to videos in the ebook in the future. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Like moeller

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Wish they provided Adson forceps instead of rat tooth because the rat tooth has already teared my mat in several places. Mat feels great and sturdy otherwise. The needle holder doesn’t have the best grip but can’t complain much with the price. Funny thing is that this suture practice kit provides more practice sutures than the $100 suture kit from surgireal lmao
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I received the suture kit on Mon (2-25-19) and the kit kit was complete as advertised. However, the link to download the instruction e-book did not work. On Tuesday without my prompting I received an email from Sabrina saying that the link may not work. So I followed her recommendation and tried again but without success. I sent her an email telling her that. Then today I received an email from Martin with the e-book attached as a pdf file. So I'm very happy with Medical Creations' customer service and I would purchase from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Paynter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Suture Kit for Aspiring Medical Professionals
customer_reviews.text: I received this suture kit as a gift for Christmas. I am a second-year medical student and so far I love the suture kit. I have had no prior exposure to suturing before and with the help of this kit and the textbook, I feel very prepared going into my suturing course. I would highly recommend this for anyone looking to go into the medical field. It is always nice to get a head start on practicing this valuable skill.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A

customer_reviews.title: This product helps me advance my skill and knowledge
customer_reviews.text: I truly was estatic when my kit arrived. I rushed home to open everything and take a look. This is my first suturing kit, and I purchased it because we did a suturing activity at school and I wanted to do more suturing during my free time. I am a current high school student looking forward for a career in medicine. Thank you for selling a product that helps me advance my skill and knowledge
customer_reviews.author: R. Benson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME KIT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This suture kit is amazing! I am a PA student and I am loving it! Highly recommend for anyone going into the medical field that will find themselves suturing in clinic! It came with everything you could possibly need to practice including an in depth online guide to get you started! The suturing pad is very durable and holds up with several rounds of sutures! Comes with many sutures for hours and hours of practice! I absolutely love this kit and I have been enjoying learning and practicing new things with it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sevin

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for suturing beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I had a very slight issue with the contents and Medical Creations made it right immediately. I could not be happier with this kit. Tools and pad are of highest quality. If you’re looking through all the similar suturing kits on here, this should be your choice. Accept no knockoffs. Also huge bonus is the included e-book, this was very helpful as a beginner. This is a great gift idea for any medical student, PA or NP student!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for students!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect for students who are interesting in practicing their suturing skills! It comes with everything you see in the picture, and the quality is durable. This works perfect as a gift as well!
customer_reviews.author: sighborg

customer_reviews.title: Helpful company, great kit
customer_reviews.text: Got the kit and had to follow up with the company about the e-book. I expected it to take all day to hear back, literally took 5 minutes to sort out. They are very responsive and the kit is exactly as advertised. The skin has a good feel and is fantastic for practicing on. Very pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for healthcare professionals
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was easy to use. The instruments and sutures are cheap and that's ok its just for practice. However, its not like the real thing and you may feel like an expert on this kit and when you suture on a person, its totally different. I would not recommend. Also, the material tears easily if you try to do subcuticular sutures. I would say you are better off getting instruments where you can and practicing on some poultry or pork.
customer_reviews.author: Privacy Lover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit. Excellent e-book. Excellent Experience!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the quality of not only the kit but also the free e-book that comes with it! Gives you a comprehensive introduction to not only technique but how to go about choosing the materials for the job. Well written and easy to follow. I got a coupon through the Medical Creations instagram page! Not only that, but the people who run the account are super helpful and reaponsive to any questions or concerns that I've had. Really positive customer experience!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Hard to practice certain types of sutures on this due to its lack of durability. For instance I attempted to do a simple buried suture and it just tears right through. Good for practicing knot tying and other skills but not ideal for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Carley Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews and I'm not being paid to write this, but I wanted share the great customer service I received by Medical Creations. After complaining about the skin suture pad tearing and some breaking after practicing suturing, this company went above and beyond by refunding my purchase, sending me a new suture pad, and providing me with additional resources to learn suturing. They responded quickly to my questions and messages with great information and help. The new pad is better than the first one and I have had no issues so far! The instruments are great for practicing and are well worth the money. I definitely recommend this seller and this product!
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: A must-have suture kit!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!!!! I'm going for PA - General Surgery and I'd figure I'd give this kit a shot. First, the suture kit is not too big, making it easy to take anywhere. It comes with a lot of threads, making it easy for me to practice suturing as much times as I wanted. The suturing board has different lacerations that come in weird shapes and sizes, forcing you to think and inspire you to do a good job. I love this suture kit and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis A. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Very good product to buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this suture kit so much! The practice pad features the layers of skin to display an accurate representation of suturing real skin. Has lots is different threads to give a diverse amount of thickness to the threads of the nylon and silk threads. Comes with a needle driver that is nice quality and blades that you can make a scalpel with to have an extra tool. Very glad I bought this and I’m sure you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden Chiaramonte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kindergarteners
customer_reviews.text: This thing is tiny, and I mean TINY. the only instrument that is regular sized are the pickups. The material the pad is made of is not great for practicing all types of suturing. If you are trying to practice subcuticular running sutures good luck. The only redeeming feature is that you can throw it in your bag and use it to practice dexterity.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I’ve been looking for a good suture practice kit for the past month, and came across this brand on YouTube. So glad I went ahead and purchased. The skin pad feels great and durable. They provide all the tools you need, including a suture training ebook, which I use as a supplement to YouTube videos. I’ve sutured chicken breasts in the pass, but I wanted something I could take on the go. I do wish the case was large enough to fit the pad, but that’s my only con. Overall, I’m very impressed and excited to learn! Also, because I must give props when it’s due, customer service for this company is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Giiselle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kit from an Amazing company
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed by the value of this product! The e-book gives very detailed and simple instructions on how to use the equipment and kit. The forceps, threads, needle driver, scalpel, etc. all work great and I have had no problems with them. Also, the staff of Medical Creations are awesome—their customer service is excellent! Finally, I would highly recommend this kit to anyone who is looking for a suture kit. You can't get better than this one!
customer_reviews.author: M. Petree

customer_reviews.title: Really needed the instructional without the virus alert!
customer_reviews.text: The kit is amazing and will be very helpful. The ebook was less so. Downloading it created a virus alert on my computer and I never received a copy, which was part of the reason I chose the kit. Further review indicated there was no way to opt for a printed version. Had I been able to acquire that, 5 stars would be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L.

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself and favor and buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself and favor and get this kit instead of other products. What an amazing product! Feels very authentic and just like real skin. Has more than enough suturing material to practice and learn various techniques! They even have an ebook for you to go over and learn. Amazing for medical students to train and learn!
customer_reviews.author: Ibroxim Zokirov

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Surface
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product for practicing suturing. It comes with plenty of suture and a practical kit to keep all of your tools in one place. I cannot speak to how it will endure the test of time as I just purchased this, however so far so good! I am comparing this to another suture kit I was operating with that was beyond obnoxious. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Ok for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Main complaint is how easily the silicon “skin” tears. In one use the thread was ripping through. Makes it difficult to practice sub Q or running stitches that are closer together. Ok for beginners, tool kit is nice. I am considering using tools and sutures on different material since the silicon has been so flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rosinski

customer_reviews.title: Quality Practice Kit
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first year PA student who got this kit for a little extra practice. I haven't had much time to play around with it yet, but I can already tell the materials are sturdy. I'm definitely going to get good use out of this. Highly recommended for anyone who wants to practice the basics of suturing.
customer_reviews.author: Anissa

customer_reviews.title: Designed by doctors? don't think so....
customer_reviews.text: Designed by doctors? don't think so.... Cheaply made silicone from China. The tools are poor quality as well, the scissors are flimsy and needle holder doesn't lock in the suture needles as you'd expect proper tools to. Good idea but poor execution. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, but I wasn't able to download the Ebook
customer_reviews.text: Update after 1st comment. When I tried the suggestion due to a font promblem, I got a hacker warning, so I won't be trying to download again. If they want to email me a PDF,I I'll try that, otherwise, we didn't get everything we paid for. Thank you for responding though. So the kit looks good, but we cannot download the Ebook, so we aren't able to use it yet. I ordered a different book, so we'll see if it is helpful getting started suturing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Murray

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Are you new to placing sutures and only interested in placing superficial ones? Great! If you are an ACTUAL medical professional who wants to practice something more complex than a superficial simple interrupted, or continuous, or cruciate? Skip this product. The "sub-dermal" layer is so pathetically weak, that I wasn't even able to practice burying a knot. I was only able to place half of the starting knot before tearing either the suture material (3-0 monifilament) or the needle itself through, once. ONCE! This product is garbage. The only thing it's good for are the decent tools, the scalpel blades, and the suture material, and you can find these elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Family Mix

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: This suture kit is great, it comes with tools that work really well, and a decent amount of sutures to work with. It also comes with some blades and a blade holder, not sure what they are for but it is pretty cool. I used up all the spaces pretty quickly. I will say that the texture of the "skin" obviously is very unlike what normal skin feels like, which is fine, but it also is like a bit gummy, so the sutures can easily come out, and once you make the holes and take the sutures out, you cant really re-do it. But otherwise this kit is great.
customer_reviews.author: suzibelle

customer_reviews.title: Practice makes perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tool to have to practice difficult and simple suturing techniques. They also have how to videos for beginners and a great informational ebook. You can’t go wrong with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great practice!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a medical practice and ever since have been wanting to practice suturing since I see it performed so much. I saw the amazing reviews from this and decided I had to try it myself. It has everything that I need and so convenient to have a case for my tools. The silicone pad is perfect and I like how it's weighted enough so I won't end up moving it around as I'm threading through the silicone skin. Customer service and E-book was a plus. I would highly recommend this product for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: The hemostats my school had us practice with were garbage and I was expecting similar hemostats in this kit but much to my surprise, they actually hold shut. Plenty of suture to practice with too (3 different kinds). Good buy for all medical students
customer_reviews.author: BillyBobJoe Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I like it but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the multiple needles and threads inside the pack. The scissors and needle holder seem quite sturdy and durable but the fake skin is very sticky, weak. It easily rips and tears so you cant reuse the same site.
customer_reviews.author: Beeezy

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good value
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter is a freshman in college, and going to premed. She said it was like the one they used for practicing phlebotomy in her medical assistant class.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Practical and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the items included with this kit! I figured that since it was so inexpensive the stuff would be cheaply made. I downloaded the ebook included and got started right away. This kit is practical and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: I am currently in nurse practitioner school and purchased this for practice. This is a great kit to learn on. The included ebook was also very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: michelle h

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for beginners to learn how to suture. The pad gives you multiple lacerations types and you are able to practice different stitches. If you want to learn how to suture, this is a great start. Only needed better tweezers not a big deal either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together product, as well as a very helpful customer service. Highly recommend this product and this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Rhbaker1995

customer_reviews.title: Best service ever
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this suture kit. I can practice sutures over and over for perfection. It’s like having a real person to suture. It come with everything I needed and it was more then I ever imagined it would be. The service was fast on delivery. I would recommend this company to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gin RN

customer_reviews.title: Not realistic representation of real suturing
customer_reviews.text: The needle drivers are very cheaply made. They click in and out of place without any movement whatsoever. The suturing needles are weak, bendable, and poor quality. The thread is not realistic to thread used in an actual hospital environment. If you're looking for a realistic suturing pad, this does not feel or act like real skin at all. I am not very satisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Savarino

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Friendly Staff!
customer_reviews.text: I got this suture kit for my brother because he is an aspiring general surgeon. He loved it so much. It came within days of ordering and the company was so nice and checked in every once in a while on Instagram. I would definitely recommend this to any aspiring surgeon.
customer_reviews.author: Katey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing! Awesome kit for practicing sutures! The staff selling it is just great! I would recommend it to the whole world. Thank you Looking forward for more
customer_reviews.author: Lollo77

customer_reviews.title: Best Suture Kit
customer_reviews.text: This product is well-engineered when you take old stitches out you aren't left with gaping holes. The pad is 'flesh-like' all the way through. The needles and thread provided are also of great quality. I know with the suture clinic I have done at my school the needles tend to run on the cheaper side and break, but I haven't even had these needles bend. Will definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine B. Wilford

customer_reviews.title: Great Suture Kit
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent product! I enjoyed using it to practice. It comes with EVERYTHING you need, and an intructions packet for beginners. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a great buy
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great. It’s my first time suturing and this kit comes with everything that you would need. It’s lightweight and easy to transport with multiple tools that come in a convenient zipper carrying case. The suture pad has a hard platform underneath so you don’t have to keep sticking and removing the pad to various surfaces. I have remove stitches and there is little to no evidence of doing so. Overall, it’s a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good!!
customer_reviews.text: material is quite durable and mimics human skin very well, which makes for very good practice. Was provided with ample amount of suture material that also worked very well. I would definitely recommend this for anyone who seeks to further enhance the basics of suturing
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company
customer_reviews.text: Coming from someone who has never sutured before, this product is great. The ebook does a great job at explaining the basics and the people who run Medical Creations are fantastic. They go above and beyond for their costumers and I’m excited to continue business with them!
customer_reviews.author: Alie Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Pad doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like it, but the pad doesnt hold up. Interrupted sutures were ok, but continuous sutures completely tore the pad apart. You can't use this pad more than once. –‐------------- * Edit 6.25.19 I have to give the product 3 stars. Even though the pad did not hold up, the company's customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny M Soe

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very concise kit that contains everything needed for a little bit of extra practice! The pad holds up well, and the tools they sent with it were well made. Plenty of sutures as well! Look forward to prepping for my rotations with this.
customer_reviews.author: electro

customer_reviews.title: Quality over other amazon suture kits
customer_reviews.text: Amazing suture kit. Literally has EVERYTHING you need to learn quickly and efficiently. Absolutely love it. Me and my nursing sister have been using it together and we have been having an absolute blast while learning. Highly recommended compared to other suture kits!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Great study tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I’m new to the nursing world and this is preparing me wonderfully for when we perform stitches. Easy to work with, great instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how life-like to material was and really enjoyed the various wound patterns, depths, and lengths to practice with. The instruments were great to practice with and thread a nice touch! Would recommend to any student or medical professional looking to strengthen their suturing skills.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing way to start learning!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this kit, from the needle holder all the way to the strings themselves. It’s super easy to work with, and comes with all the basic necessities you can think of. It’s been super useful in beginning to learn different stitching patterns and such, and I’m glad I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice!
customer_reviews.text: Great for practicing. I'm a PA student and use this board all the time for practice. The nylon sutures tear the board more than the silk, so maybe start out with the silk when you're first starting!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Coons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the medical student!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is starting college this year going into the medical field. I bought her this suture kit and she absolutely loves it! She has already been taking classes and shadowing surgeries but wanted to practice more at home.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this kit! It's great for learning suturing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic, skin like texture.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product because it helps me to practice on something that replicates actual human skin. For example: it will tear if you stitch too tight. The products similarity to human skin makes it easy to perfect your stitches whenever you like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellet practice kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! It provides so many different kinds of ways to practice your suturing. I also love the fact that it comes with a great set of tools, I highly recommend this kit to anyone wanting to practice their technique!
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! It great for practice and fun. This kit has allowed me to become more confident in my venture to applying to dental school. I also love that it has all the necessary tools and it came with many threads! This is a must buy and I highly encourage you to get it
customer_reviews.author: K Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great seller! Quick response times!
customer_reviews.text: This item is GREAT! Very easy purchase and the seller was quick to respond to me when the promo code I received was expired. I suture all the time at work and now I am excited to be able to hone in my skills and learn new patterns at home. Thank you so much, Tom!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Informational
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing. It includes everything you would really use to do sutures and it includes a download of a free ebook that is so informational. They show you step by step what to do and it’s so helpful. 10/10 would recommend to everybody
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. A must have for medical students or nurse practitioner / pa students. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: juan carlos navas

customer_reviews.title: You Cant Go Wrong With This!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely would recommend! This is a great product--so much like the real thing. Great for practicing your suture skills. A+ Quality.
customer_reviews.author: BookBarb

customer_reviews.title: Best product to practice with!
customer_reviews.text: This product comes with everything!!! The only thing that I would recommend to change is the ebook. I think having step by step pictures or YouTube video links would be more helpful.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer polanco

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about this kit! The pad seems to be good quality and I like the variety of wounds. They also give you plenty of thread. Finally, the ebook is helpful and shows you a lot of different techniques, from beginner to advanced sutures. Not all suture kits come with an ebook, which is why I chose this one in particular.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: I have zero experience suturing, but wanted to learn how. This practice kit is great! The instructional .pdf and videos really make it. Highly recommend if you want to learn suturing. Comes with quite a bit of sutures to practice with. I found the silk one's the best for practicing because they are the most visible.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Arrives fast, Durable, perfect for beginners/continuers, free Ebook!
customer_reviews.text: This suture kit I got was incredible! It came with everything seen in the picture above, and it came 2 days earlier! I had a malfunction with one of the forceps when it came, and I contacted one of the supervisors and they helped me out and sent a new one with no extra cost. This is hands down one of the best things to buy on Amazon, this is definitely recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: svetlana popa

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing! The pad is the most realistic i’ve ever had after purchasing many other kits similar to this which were more expensive. For the price, this product is absolutely amazing and comes with great tools and resources!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing suture kit! Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say this is a great kit, packaged nicely and if you follow the company on insta they have videos that guide any new student. Plus customer service is excellent and they sent me extra threads due to a promotion. The mat for practicing has a skin like feel and all I want to do is practice.... when I definitely need to study content also :) Happy suturing!
customer_reviews.author: Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty informative and straight forward. If you’ve already had some medical training then there should be quite a good and easy starter kit for anyone. If you’re just wanting to start and learn some basics before getting into the serious stuff this kit is a definitely good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: Best product out there, best customer support!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, awesome for beginners to learn on. Had a little bit of issues downloading the free book due to the link provided, but the company quickly fixed that for me. I am going to buy another one for my son, who keeps using my set. Love the product!!
customer_reviews.author: Blade2070

customer_reviews.title: All what you need
customer_reviews.text: This kit all what you need to master your suture skills as a medical student, intern and sirgical resident. I am a left handed surgical resident and using this kit to work on my right hand skills. Get your kit and ace your sutures!
customer_reviews.author: Hamda Almaazmi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product!! I sent an email to the company because I couldn’t access the ebook and they responded in 3 minutes!!! I am going towards the veterinary route, but this is still very beneficial to me! I would highly recommend this product to anybody just starting up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey

customer_reviews.title: Not a single complaint!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. The silicone pad really feels like true flesh, the different incision sizes really helps to get some great practice in. The online guide is great to learn from, I love it for nursing practice. Overall, just a fabulous product for any profession that include suturing/removing sutures in the scope of practice (I’m a nurse).
customer_reviews.author: Ghadir M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Well made and comes with lots of suture threads, Had a small issue downloading the ebook but the customer service was top notch and I received the ebook within a few hours of emailing. Very responsive team of people.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Jon

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought for teenage son to practice on don’t think he used it
customer_reviews.author: Rosalia Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It is durable and easy t use and the e-book that accompanied the kit was really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: D.R. Garvin

customer_reviews.title: Tools came fused together, cheap and unusable. DONT. BUY.
customer_reviews.text: I would love to practice suturing, however this product is so poorly made that the tools that are supposed to open and closed, came fused together and can’t even be used as a toothpick let alone clamps and tools! Very poor quality, completely unusable and I’m extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners kit!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a new EMT and wanted to learn how to do sutures! I think this is a great beginners kit even if this is a close as I will ever get to the real thing. I am very excited to learn. The kit has has everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: patrick j. murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice
customer_reviews.text: The perfect package that will get you started on working on your suturing techniques. I am an MS3 and this has been great to get me started on my suturing techniques for my surgical rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Rafat Dallo

customer_reviews.title: So convenient! Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Best kit out there and best company to work with! They are so helpful and go over the top to make sure you have everything you need. Definitely recommend buying!
customer_reviews.author: K Hog

customer_reviews.title: Nice for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it much yet, but it came with a lot of great information. Nice for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This kit is awesome! It has all of the essential suture equipments, and more! The practice kit is mimicked like real human tissues ( amazing I know ) and it has all verities of cuts! If you’re a med student or someone who is just trying to see if you’re any good, I highly suggest this kit right here!!
customer_reviews.author: Blkenvvy

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVESTMENT THUS FAR!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing! I love that I can make new “incisions” and reuse the old ones. I also like how small the needles are, teaches me accuracy and patience which is exactly what I need!! Thank you for this amazing invention I couldn’t go through mortuary school without it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried to suture before getting this product. I have used it a few times and I love how it comes in a little box that is easy to carry around so I can practice anywhere. The material seems to be pretty durable too! The free book that comes with a purchase is also really helpful for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn E

customer_reviews.title: Not good for anything but simple interrupted probably
customer_reviews.text: Terrible for doing anything other than a basic interrupted suture. The “skin” is too tough and also rips if you try to do a deep suture. The needle driver and pickups are also short. Major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: ConcernedCitizen

customer_reviews.title: Suture kit
customer_reviews.text: Just received my suture training kit yesterday.. The kit itself is just like the ones I have practiced with in the past. The instruments were full size. Also, it has it own storage kit. Everything in one place.. I had to email and request the book. Which was emailed to me immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, well put together hope to learn a lot.
customer_reviews.text: The kit seems very well put together, perfect for someone just staring to learn about suturing. It seems as close to the "real" thing as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable, rips easy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to practice suturing during my rotation in surgery. The "skin" feels rough but the needle and anything tears right though it. Not useful and sadly will be searching for another. While needles and the forceps feel durable and well made, sadly the skin is to fragile to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to practice suturing technique.
customer_reviews.text: Great medium, so much nicer than other products. I had a glitch with the ebook link not working, but I received a prompt response and the download for the ebook. Outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn L

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: This product has been the highest quality order of mine yet! It’s exactly what I wanted, I couldn’t ask for a better one! Although the practice pad ripped a tiny bit while I was using the nylon monofilament, it simply could have been my bad. I do definitely recommend this product to anyone who’s looking to practice sutures! I’m 13 and it was very easy for me to figure out along with the e-book that’s included.:))
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

product_meta.title: Suture Practice Kit by Medical Creations - with Suturing Video Series by Board-Certified Surgeon and Ebook Training Guide - Silicone Suturing Pad with Tool Kit - for any Student in the Medical Field
product_meta.description:
➡️SUTURING VIDEOS WITH BOARD-CERTIFIED SURGEON. We teamed up with Dr. Buck Parker to create a series of suturing videos that will teach you how to properly suture⬅️ 

 LAST GENERATION VERTICAL AND HORIZONTAL MESH; unlike other suture pads, the Medical Creations suture pad also comes with a built-in vertical mesh. This improves quality and durability and therefore makes our product superior to suture kits offered by other brands!

 ➡️SUTURING TECHNIQUES EBOOK INCLUDED📕⬅️

WE SPECIALIZE IN CREATING MEDICAL BOOKS FOR STUDENTS, OUR COMPETITORS DON'T! Don't be fooled by look-alike products!

Without a proper instruction manual created by doctors, you won’t learn how to perform accurate suturing techniques. Join our 100 K+ medical family for a lifetime of tips, help, and all questions answered by real humans!

Our bonus ebook is an easy- to-follow manual that takes you through the basic steps of suturing so that you can learn the different techniques correctly. A correctly placed suture may be the difference between a minimal scar and an unsightly one after healing. This means you won’t have to face those dreaded nerve-racking moments when placing sutures on a real patient because will be well-prepared and confident. It’s the perfect guide for beginners.

Since doctors use different kinds of threads in different situations, we included 2 different types of non absorbable suture materials (silk and nylon)! Each one of 2 different sizes (3/0 and 4/0 monofilament and braided). By practising with different kinds of threads, you will have more experience when you finally place sutures on a real patient!

NO RISK MONEY BACK GUARANTEE! Our suture practice kit is backed by our manufacturer 30 day money back guarantee with a 1 year free replacement warranty!


Specifications:

✅Suturing video series by board-certified surgeon 

✅BONUS EBOOK created by Medical Creations 

✅Large suture pad with wounds 

✅The pad consists of 3 layers of tissue including skin, fat, and muscle 

✅Suture threads (18-pack) 

✅Adson forceps 

✅Hegar needle holder 

✅Suture scissors 

✅Scalpel blades (3-pack) 

✅Storage case with zipper 

Go to the top-right of the page and click "Add to Cart"
feature_bullets: SUTURING VIDEOS WITH BOARD-CERTIFIED SURGEON. We teamed up with Dr. Buck Parker to create a series of suturing videos that will teach you how to properly suture.

LAST GENERATION VERTICAL AND HORIZONTAL MESH; unlike other suture pads, the Medical Creations suture pad also comes with a built-in vertical mesh. This improves quality and durability and therefore makes our product superior to suture kits offered by other brands. Our pad comes with a plastic stand which brings more stability during suturing. All the suturing tools you need will come in a case. Since doctors use different threads in different situations, we included 2 TYPES of material.

OUR HOW-TO BONUS EBOOK 📕 PROVIDES THE INSTRUCTIONS THAT OUR COMPETITORS DON’T; it is an easy- to-follow manual that takes you through the basic steps of suturing so that you can learn the different techniques correctly; A correctly placed suture may be the difference between a minimal scar and an unsightly one after healing; This means you won’t have to face those DREADED NERVE-RACKING moments when placing sutures on a real patient because will be WELL-PREPARED and CONFIDENT.

TAKE YOUR GAME TO THE NEXT LEVEL; our mission is to help the next generation students realise their full potential. By being the best doctor or nurse that you could possibly be, you are bound to have others admire your hard earned skills. It all starts with practicing and, by going that extra mile, you will be able to perform more advanced suturing techniques that none of you colleagues will be able to do. OUR PRODUCT IS PERFECT GIFT FOR ANY STUDENT IN THE MEDICAL OR VETERINARY FIELD.

CUSTOMER CARE PROMISE; Medical Creations is a trustworthy brand that offers COMPLETE CUSTOMER SATISFACTION, period. Our customers are more important than our sales. If for any reason you are not absolutely happy with your suture kit, WE WILL REPLACE OR REFUND YOUR ORDER, no questions asked. CONTACT US directly and we will take care of you. Since we cut no corners in our product, we will cut no corners in our support to you.
